title: [Piano cover] Fiction (ÎπÑÏä§Ìä∏) - BEAST/B2ST
description:
It's been a month since I last did a piano cover. This time is Fiction by Beast. I'm SO in love with this song. These 6 guys are flawless, I mean,  they got mad skill, dancing, singing, rapping, EVERYTHING ! 2nd boy group I admire, after Bigbang lol

N sr for the low quality. I haven't figured out how to reduce noice yet :(
*No sheet music. I just learned by ear :)

title: [Piano Cover] DJ Got Us Fallin' In Love - Usher
description:
Okayyy, so here is another piano cover I did this Sunday afternoon. I learned this song months ago but I didn't have much time to record it (cause I couldn't play smoothly at once n had to film it over n over again, ouchh) 

I apologize for the bad sound quality. I am still trying to solve this but couldn't find out yet :( 

Please comment n subscribe ! Thank you.

title: [Piano Cover] Going Crazy - Song Ji Eun
description:
This is a small cover of me to this song. Once again I just learned by ear, no sheet music ^^ I felt a lil bit creepy when I saw the MV at first, but then I got addicted to it. Haha. 

 People keep comparing this song to "Love The Way U Lie" by Rihanna. I personally think that each song has its own taste, why do we need to compare instead of enjoying the music. Both songs are nice to me ;) 

  
Thanks for watching my video. Don't forget to comment n subscribe, OK? Love u guys !!

title: [Piano Cover] Love The Way U Lie part 2 - Rihanna
[Piano cover] When The Door Closes - BEAST (B2ST)
description:
I just learned by ear, no sheet music. lol. The chorus is a lil bit too fast I think. Anw, enjoy! 

p.s: I have become a REAL fan of BEAST since I heard this song. Actually I didn't like them before ^^ But the leader n the maknae are just soooo cute, the song has a nice meaning, too. . And yeah, I've changed my mind now haha.

title: [Piano cover] Tell me Goodbye - Big Bang.wmv
description:
There is no sheet music, the one in front of me is "Don't forget" - Baek Ji Young =]] 
I just practiced few days ago so I cannot make it fully done :[ or maybe I don't feel confident in front of the camera 8-| let's call this a trial version. I hope I can finish it soon.
